title: Headless Wayland Is Getting A Whole Lot Easier
description:
Headless Xorg is incredibly useful for testing applications but isn't something the use needs to often interact but that doesn't mean it's any less useful and very recently a suite of tools came out that made doingt this super easy on Xwayland
